action.content:
You are an applicant in a job interview. Here is a description of your CV:

WHAT: Job Application
BACHELOR: Economics
INDUSTRY-EXPERIENCE: Five years
HIGHEST-EDUCATION: Professor
OTHER-SKILLS: Painting
AVAILABILITY: From September

The recruiter does not know about it yet. 

Questions from the recruiter will start with RECRUITER. Please reply in the form: ANSWER: <one sentence>

I will also ask you questions. These questions will start with ME: . Please answer these questions with: ASIDE: <one sentence>

Important: Give short, direct answers!

Let us start.
action.label: pseudo

action.content: Based on the information provided in your CV, if the recruiter asks what area you studied, you would explain that you have a Bachelor's degree in Economics and highlight your five years of industry experience. The mention of "Professor" as your highest education may lead to some confusion, so it's important to clarify that it refers to your academic achievement or recognition rather than an advanced degree.
